variable.name: SUBJID
variable.comment: T1DGC Analytic ID - an 8-digit identifer - or UNKNOWN-CASE-n

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC
variable.value: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects

variable.name: SUBJ_SOURCE
variable.value: Juvenile Diabetes Research Foundation/Wellcome Trust - Diabetes and Inflammation Laboratory

variable.name: SOURCE_SUBJID
variable.comment: JDRF/WT DIL (Juvenile Diabetes Research Foundation/Wellcome Trust - Diabetes and Inflammation Laboratory) subjectid - 9 digits plus checkletter - or UNKNOWN-CASE-n
